entry.tran: 惠斯特牌（两人一组玩的扑克牌游戏）
entry.def: Whist is a card game in which people play in pairs against each other.

means.word_mean: 1. a card game for four players who form two partnerships; a pack of 52 cards is dealt and each side scores one point for each trick it takes in excess of six
